item.title: You want quick feedback
item.description: Speed matters (most) One reason for using cloud infrastructure is speed. Quick feedback and short deployment times are a matter of course. Here is a simple example to show how Google Cloud Platform (gcp) performs. Just create a Virtual Machine and ssh into it. In under two seconds of course! Playbook Run bash create-vm.sh SSH into your machine gcloud compute ssh "worker1" Have fun :wink: Delete it gcloud compute instances delete worker1 --quiet Prerequisites To be honest there are some prerequisites:
